title: Net income of Marriott International worldwide 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Net income in million U.S. dollars
summary: In general Net income in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Net income in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The line drastically increased by 1.8 times from Year 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Net income in million U.S. dollars, of value 1372.0 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Net income in million U.S. dollars about 753.0 was reached at Year 2014
